attributes.action: Dismiss the monarchy as head of state.
attributes.background: The current Monarch has demonstrated an absence of ability, leadership or authority, repeatedly.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you'd like to replace the Monarchy with. There are already petitions about this issue which you might like to sign if they call for things you want to happen. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/270917

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/265814
